item.description:
Come on down to our previously postponed holiday dance, and yes, you can still come pay at the door. There will be entertainment and dancing with Four on the Floor. We have rented the American Legion Hall in Burlington (right off of 128) from 7:30-11:30 PM with help of our good friend Brian. There is a $10.00 charge which should cover the expenses and some snacks. There will be a cash bar. You are welcome to invite family or friends. (adults only, don't have to be single).

If you pay online please indicate that "PAID" in your reply, it will help me keep track of numbers. I appreciate your help with this. The postponements and Mother Nature hasn't helped to get this organized. There is a limit of 125 people for the hall so please reply if you plan to attend.
Come out and have a fun and casual night of dancing with a great band!
item.how_to_find_us: Hall is ours for the evening, come on in!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Holiday Dance Party
